The build quality and functionality also get mixed reviews, with some finding it well-constructed while others report issues. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Bow
items.body: I have bought this bow twice! I used for decor on a custom bar I own, when hosting bridal showers for friends and family. The white color is a true white and a lovely satin finish. Iâ€™ve also bought the bow and spray painted it red due to the theme (Italian baby boy shower). Turned out great but I did use more spray paint than I thought I would. The bow is a perfect size, weight and quality for the price! If youâ€™d like a â€œwowâ€ statement I highly recommend Read more
items.author: Rockymountain6

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant tree
items.body: Perfect for my Christmas tree. A real bargain for what others are running for. Gave my tree a reset for the holidays. Getting so many compliments and you donâ€™t even need to add any ornaments Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars OBSESSED
items.body: Obsessed with this over sized bows. I use them on my christmas trees. They are gorgeous and the perfect size for my 6ft pencil trees. I bought the black and white bows. Great quality, they are heavy duty and iron nice. I put cardboard in the top part to fluff up the bow. I love it so much the tree has stayed up. Very elegant. Read more
items.author: Brittney L.

items.body: This bow looks exactly like itâ€™s shown in the photo. Gorgeous. Satin-like material, well made, excellent product. Surprising value for the money. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to a shorter tree
items.body: Used a zip tie to attach it to the tree. I had to steam it for a while to get the wrinkles out. My tree is 6.5 feet tall and this fit perfectly. I didnâ€™t want it to drag on the floor. Read more
items.author: Marsha Gibson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great quality
items.body: I bought this recently for my daughter's wedding to hang on a sign. I was impressed with the quality of it. I half expected it to feel cheap and flimsy but it wasn't at all. Read more
items.author: Lisa Cloward

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Huge Bow
items.body: I used this bow to attach in my hair in Japan for Aesthetic!!! It is intended to be attached to fabric, so it only had safety pins. I feel that it should have sturdier security fasteners due to the weight of the bow itself ( itâ€™s heavy) still very nice quality and constructed well. Read more
items.author: Kiera

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Satin Style, Ivory White Satin Style, Ivory White Tulle Style, Black Satin Style, Hot Pink Satin Style, Ivory Satin Style, Champagne Gold Satin Style. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
